text: 4:13 1 Korin 14:20; Kolosi 1:28; 2:2Eghtɨ ingangarir kam mamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨtɨ en nɨghnɨzir gavgavim bar gavgavightɨ bizir kam e damutɨ e bar moghɨra navir vamɨra ikiamin arazim inigh, egh Godɨn Otarim guizbangɨra bar a gɨfogham. Kamaghɨn damightɨ e Kraisɨn gɨn zuir darorir kamɨn aven, e tugh gavgavigh aghung mangɨ, gumazir aruabar avaghɨva e guizbangɨra Kraisɨn mɨn otogham.
